name: Infinite Dynasty
description:
Welcome to Infinite Dynasty! Play through the lifetime of a whole empire, living the cycles of dynasties and rebellion up until its demise or its supremacy!

Controls: Everything’s point n’ click with the Mouse

In this game, you’ll lead a new empire to glory. As its overseer, all you want is for your citizens to reach utmost happiness. But, unfortunately, running an empire is kinda hard. You gotta think about food, enemies, investing, yada yada. Sometimes you mess this up and piss off the very citizens you care for so much. Sometimes they’ll even go so far as to throw a rebellion.

But worry not, because in Infinite Dynasty, your will exceeds time. You’ll guide this empire through every single one of its dynasties, either to utopia or to oblivion. Take the experience from the fallen dynasties to strive for the goal!

So create your own empire and see how its journey unfolds!

…Or just watch it die cuz we didn’t have time to balance properly.

Made by Imon, Matthew, Ansa, krischan, Aryaman, and Jerry
